page.title: 14TOURISM IN STRETTON
page.content: The shops in Stretton depend quite a lot on business brought by tourists. Without tourists many shopping businesses would not thrive as they do. The market comes on Thursday and tourists are likely to come. It attracts people constantly because of the natural market atmostphere and the cheap fruit and vegetables. The park attracts people. Generally people with children but some without come for the pleasure of it. The Rectory Wood, owned by the Shropshire County Council is a good tourist attraction, along with Ragleth Wood. Tourists can stay in either{The Long {Mynd Hotel, The Sandford Hotel, The {Denehurst Hotel}or if they prefer, there are small guest houses and bed and breakfast places.
